attributes.action: Re-run EU Referendum for 16+ UK citizens based on true facts now known to all.
attributes.additional_details:
A referendum should include sixteen plus ages as in the Scottish referendum- remember these people will be eighteen plus at 'Brexit.'
Many alleged 'facts' which will have influenced some voters' choices have now been shown false.
Whatever the outcome, an honest referendum where genuine facts (not misinformation and bad-mouthing) dictate choices is essential. 
This is important and will affect our children for years to come.
attributes.background:
Some information has now been corrected. 
Many voters apparently wish to change their vote in the light of greater information. 
16+ age citizens should vote as in the two years 'Brexit' may take they will be of age. This was also allowed in the Scottish Referendum.
